"You keep away you goons, Snow Stalker, maximize," Snow Stalker transformed, 
her robot mode was definitely feminine, even though she looked like 
Tigatron, "you keep your hands away from Nightblade or I'll blow you to 
bits," Snow Stalker threatened as she held both of her guns out.
